ValidationRule.description: A Solution can only be provided after a restore has been done (taking into account cases without restore) (Defect: 13241)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Parent.RecordType.Name = "Nokia Incident with Restoration", ISPICKVAL(CH_Email_Type__c,"Solution Provided"), NOT(Parent.CH_IsCompleteRestore__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please perform a Restore prior to providing a Solution.
